languages.text: Офицеры вдохновляют своих товарищей и дают им дополнительные возможности для действий. Ключевая {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}способность{/g} офицера, {g|f:9c78e44bf8ff44a9afff8370c673c9ad}Приказ командира{/g}, повышает {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}характеристики{/g} союзного персонажа на (5 + 2 × {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}бонус{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Общительности{/g} офицера) на 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раунд{/g}. Вдобавок этот союзник может быть целью других способностей офицера вне зависимости от расстояния между ними.

Officers inspire their comrades-in-arms and grant them additional opportunities to impact the course of battle. The Officer keystone {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g}, {g|f:9c78e44bf8ff44a9afff8370c673c9ad}Voice of Command{/g}, increases an ally's {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g} by +(5 + 2 × Officer's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Fellowship{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g}) for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}. An ally affected by this ability can also be targeted by the Officer's other abilities from any distance.
languages.original_text: Лидеры вдохновляют своих товарищей и дают им дополнительные возможности для действий. Ключевая способность лидеров, Приказ командира, повышает характеристики союзного персонажа на (5 + 2 × бонус ОБЩ лидера) на 1 раунд. Вдобавок этот союзник может быть целью других способностей лидера вне зависимости от расстояния между ними.

traits.locale_text: Leaders inspire their comrades-in-arms and grant them additional opportunities to impact the course of battle. The Leader keystone ability Voice of Command increases an ally's characteristics by +(5 + 2 × Leader's FEL bonus) for 1 round. An ally affected by this ability can also be targeted by the Leader's other abilities from any distance.

Leaders inspire their comrades-in-arms and grant them additional opportunities to impact the course of battle. The Leader keystone ability Voice of Command increases an ally's characteristics by +(5 + 2 × Leader's FEL bonus) for 1 round. An ally affected by this ability can also be targeted by the Leader's other abilities from any distance.

Leaders inspire their comrades-in-arms and grant them additional opportunities to impact the course of battle. The Leader keystone ability Voice of Command increases an ally's characteristics by +(5 + 2 × Leader's FEL bonus) for 1 round. An ally affected by this ability can also be targeted by the Leader's other abilities from any distance.

Officers inspire their comrades-in-arms and grant them additional opportunities to impact the course of battle. The Officer keystone {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} Voice of Command increases an ally's {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g} by +(5 + 2 × Officer's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Fellowship{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g}) for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}. An ally affected by this ability can also be targeted by the Officer's other abilities from any distance.

Officers inspire their comrades-in-arms and grant them additional opportunities to impact the course of battle. The Officer keystone {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} Voice of Command increases an ally's {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g} by +(5 + 2 × Officer's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Fellowship{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g}) for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}. An ally affected by this ability can also be targeted by the Officer's other abilities from any distance.

languages.text: Offiziere begeistern ihre Gefechtskameraden und gewähren ihnen zusätzliche Gelegenheiten zur Beeinflussung des Kampfgeschehens. Die Grundstein-{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}Fähigkeit{/g} des Offiziers, Stimme des Kommandos, erhöht die {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}Eigenschaften{/g} eines Verbündeten für 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}Runde{/g} um +(5 + 2 × {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Gefolgschaft{/g}-{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}Bonus{/g} des Offiziers). Ein von dieser Fähigkeit beeinflusster Verbündeter kann außerdem aus jeglicher Entfernung von den anderen Fähigkeiten des Offiziers anvisiert werden.
languages.original_text: Officers inspire their comrades-in-arms and grant them additional opportunities to impact the course of battle. The Officer keystone {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} Voice of Command increases an ally's {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g} by +(5 + 2 × Officer's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Fellowship{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g}) for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}. An ally affected by this ability can also be targeted by the Officer's other abilities from any distance.

traits.locale_text: Offiziere begeistern ihre Gefechtskameraden und gewähren ihnen zusätzliche Gelegenheiten zur Beeinflussung des Kampfgeschehens. Die Grundstein-{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}Fähigkeit{/g} des Offiziers, {g|f:9c78e44bf8ff44a9afff8370c673c9ad}Stimme des Kommandos{/g}, erhöht die {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}Eigenschaften{/g} eines Verbündeten für 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}Runde{/g} um +(5 + 2 × {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Gefolgschaft{/g}-{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}Bonus{/g} des Offiziers). Ein von dieser Fähigkeit beeinflusster Verbündeter kann außerdem aus jeglicher Entfernung von den anderen Fähigkeiten des Offiziers anvisiert werden.

languages.text: Les officiers inspirent leurs frères d'armes et leur offrent des possibilités supplémentaires d'influer sur le cours des combats. La {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacité{/g} clé de l'officier {g|f:9c78e44bf8ff44a9afff8370c673c9ad}Voix du commandement{/g} augmente les {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}caractéristiques{/g} d'un allié de +(5 + 2 × {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Sociabilité{/g} de l'officier) pendant 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}. Un allié affecté par cette capacité peut également être ciblé par les autres capacités de l'officier, quelle que soit la distance qui les sépare.
languages.original_text: Officers inspire their comrades-in-arms and grant them additional opportunities to impact the course of battle. The Officer keystone {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g}, {g|f:9c78e44bf8ff44a9afff8370c673c9ad}Voice of Command{/g}, increases an ally's {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g} by +(5 + 2 × Officer's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Fellowship{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g}) for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}. An ally affected by this ability can also be targeted by the Officer's other abilities from any distance.

traits.locale_text: Les officiers inspirent leurs compagnons d'armes et leur offrent des possibilités supplémentaires d'influer sur le cours des combats. La {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacité{/g} clé de l’officier {g|f:9c78e44bf8ff44a9afff8370c673c9ad}Voix du Commandement{/g} augmente les {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}caractéristiques{/g} d'un allié de +(5 + 2 × {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Sociabilité{/g} de l’officier) pendant 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}. Un allié affecté par cette capacité peut également être ciblé par les autres capacités de l’officier quelle que soit la distance.

languages.text: 军官会激励战友，让他们获得更多战斗的机会，来影响战斗的进程。军官的关键{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}能力{/g}：{g|f:9c78e44bf8ff44a9afff8370c673c9ad}指挥之声{/g}，可以让目标盟友的所有{g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}属性{/g}提高（5+2×军官的{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}社交{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}加值{/g}）点，效果持续一{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}。 当盟友受“命令之声”影响时，军官可以直接对该盟友使用任何能力，无视两者之间的距离。
languages.original_text: Officers inspire their comrades-in-arms and grant them additional opportunities to impact the course of battle. The Officer keystone {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g}, {g|f:9c78e44bf8ff44a9afff8370c673c9ad}Voice of Command{/g}, increases an ally's {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g} by +(5 + 2 × Officer's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Fellowship{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g}) for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}. An ally affected by this ability can also be targeted by the Officer's other abilities from any distance.

traits.locale_text: 军官会激励战友，让他们获得更多战斗的机会，来影响战斗的进程。军官的关键{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}能力{/g}：指挥之声，可以让目标盟友的所有{g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}属性{/g}提高（5+2×军官的{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}社交{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}加值{/g}）点，效果持续一{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}。 当盟友受“命令之声”影响时，军官可以直接对该盟友使用任何能力，无视两者之间的距离。

languages.text: Los oficiales inspiran a sus camaradas y les confieren más oportunidades de alterar el curso de la refriega. La {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacidad{/g} clave de los oficiales, {g|f:9c78e44bf8ff44a9afff8370c673c9ad}Voz de mando{/g}, aumenta las {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}características{/g} de un aliado en +(5 + 2 × {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonificación{/g} por {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Empatía{/g} del oficial) durante 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}asalto{/g}. Las demás capacidades del oficial pueden, además, marcar como objetivo a cualquier aliado que se vea afectado por Voz de mando, independientemente de la distancia que los separe.
languages.original_text: Officers inspire their comrades-in-arms and grant them additional opportunities to impact the course of battle. The Officer keystone {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g}, {g|f:9c78e44bf8ff44a9afff8370c673c9ad}Voice of Command{/g}, increases an ally's {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g} by +(5 + 2 × Officer's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Fellowship{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g}) for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}. An ally affected by this ability can also be targeted by the Officer's other abilities from any distance.

traits.locale_text: Los oficiales inspiran a sus camaradas y les confieren más oportunidades de alterar el curso de la refriega. La {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacidad{/g} clave de los oficiales, {g|f:9c78e44bf8ff44a9afff8370c673c9ad}Voz de mando{/g}, aumenta las {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}características{/g} de un aliado en +(5 + 2 × {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonificación{/g} por {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Empatía{/g} del oficial) durante 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}asalto{/g}. Las demás capacidades del oficial pueden, además, marcar como objetivo a cualquier aliado que se vea afectado por Voz de mando, independientemente de la distancia que los separe.

languages.original_text: Leaders inspire and empower their comrades. The leaders' key ability, Commander's Command, increases the performance of an allied character by (5 + 2 × OVERALL bonus) for 1 turn. In addition, that ally can be the target of other leader abilities regardless of the distance between them.

languages.text: 士官は武装した仲間を奮い立たせ、戦況に影響を及ぼす追加の機会を仲間に与える。士官の要となる{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}アビリティ{/g}は{g|f:9c78e44bf8ff44a9afff8370c673c9ad}指揮の声{/g}であり、これは1{g|Encyclopedia:Round}ラウンド{/g}の間、仲間の{g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}特性{/g}を+(5 + 2 × 士官の{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}連帯{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}ボーナス{/g})増加する。 このアビリティの影響下にある仲間は、いかなる距離からでも士官の他のアビリティの対象とすることができる。
languages.original_text: Officers inspire their comrades-in-arms and grant them additional opportunities to impact the course of battle. The Officer keystone {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g}, {g|f:9c78e44bf8ff44a9afff8370c673c9ad}Voice of Command{/g}, increases an ally's {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g} by +(5 + 2 × Officer's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Fellowship{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g}) for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}. An ally affected by this ability can also be targeted by the Officer's other abilities from any distance.

languages.text: Subaylar silah arkadaşlarını yüreklendirerek onlara savaşın gidişatına etki edecek yeni fırsatlar kazandırırlar. Subay'ın kilit {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}kabiliyeti{/g} olan Emir Sözü, bir dost birimin {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}niteliklerini{/g} 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rauntluğuna{/g} +(5 + 2 × Subay'ın {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Sosyallik{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonusu{/g}) kadar artırır. Subay, bu kabiliyetten etkilenen bir dost birimi herhangi bir mesafeden diğer kabiliyetlerinin de hedefi yapabilir.
languages.original_text: Officers inspire their comrades-in-arms and grant them additional opportunities to impact the course of battle. The Officer keystone {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} Voice of Command increases an ally's {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g} by +(5 + 2 × Officer's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Fellowship{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g}) for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.
